name: Galaxy Z Fold 5
description: The Galaxy Z Fold 5 redefines the smartphone experience with its foldable design and powerful performance.

name: iPad Pro 12.9
description: The iPad Pro 12.9 offers a powerful M1 chip, Liquid Retina XDR display, and 5G connectivity.

name: MacBook Air M2
description: The MacBook Air M2 is an ultra-thin and lightweight laptop with the powerful M2 chip for seamless performance.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Sony’s WH-1000XM5 offers industry-leading noise cancellation and premium sound quality.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve
description: The Bose SoundLink Revolve is a portable Bluetooth speaker delivering 360° sound.

name: Apple Watch Series 8
description: The Apple Watch Series 8 offers health and fitness tracking with a durable, water-resistant design.

name: PlayStation 5
description: The PlayStation 5 delivers breathtaking gaming experiences with lightning-fast load times and 4K gaming.

name: Surface Pro 9
description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 is a versatile tablet-laptop hybrid, perfect for productivity on the go.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 is an ultraportable laptop with a stunning 4K display and top-notch performance.

name: Google Pixel 7
description: The Google Pixel 7 offers an exceptional camera, clean Android experience, and powerful AI features.
